title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.2.10 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars appear enabled. However, they are non-functional and do not have any effect. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.  
2. Observe the enabled scrollbars.  
3. Attempt to interact with the scrollbars and notice that they have no effect.
